approve.description: Approves the spender to spend a specified amount of tokens on behalf of the owner.

transfer.description: Transfers tokens from the caller's account to the specified recipient.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another using the allowance mechanism.

increaseAllowance.description: Increases the allowance granted to a spender by the caller.

decreaseAllowance.description: Decreases the allowance granted to a spender by the caller.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining amount of tokens that the spender can spend on behalf of the owner.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of tokens held by the specified account.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimal places used to get the user representation of the token.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

Transfer.description: Emitted when tokens are transferred from one account to another.

other_functions.description: Emitted when an owner approves a spender.
